verses.text: \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w senseless|strong="G0453"\w* \w Galatians|strong="G1052"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* hath \w bewitched|strong="G0940"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* should \w not|strong="G3739"\w* obey \w the|strong="G3739"\w* truth, \w before|strong="G2596"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* hath \w been|strong="G5547"\w* set forth, \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w among|strong="G2596"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?

Wherefore \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w our|strong="G5547"\w* pedagogue \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w might|strong="G5547"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.
